byline: Gigi Douban, Noel King, Mitchell Hartman, Bruce Johnson, Sam Beard, Isabel Angell, David Brancaccio, Queena Kim and Johnny Niemann
description: Germany and France are launching what they call a 'New Deal' to combat the problem of youth employment in Europe. 25 percent are out of work in the euro zone -- that figure rises to more than 50 percent in Greece and Spain. Luxury jeweler Tiffany announces earnings today. And will baseball show up at the next Summer Olympic Games? Not likely.
title: Marketplace Morning Report for Tuesday, May 28, 2013
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Tuesday, May 28, 2013
teaser: Germany and France are launching what they call a 'New Deal' to combat the problem of youth employment in Europe. 25 percent are out of work in the euro zone -- that figure rises to more than 50 percent in Greece and Spain.
